price: Ese ntibatekereza ku magambo (ya Allah), cyangwa (babuzwa kuyemera nuko) bagezweho n’ibitarageze ku babyeyi babo bo hambere?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
